00037 #include "egs_polygon_shape.h"
00038 #include "egs_polygon.h"
00039 #include "egs_input.h"
00040 #include "egs_functions.h"
00041 #include "egs_math.h"
00042 
00043 EGS_TriangleShape::EGS_TriangleShape(const vector<EGS_Float> &points,
00044                                      const string &Name, EGS_ObjectFactory *f) : EGS_SurfaceShape(Name,f) {
00045     xo = points[0];
00046     yo = points[1];
00047     ax = points[2] - xo;
00048     ay = points[3] - yo;
00049     bx = points[4] - xo;
00050     by = points[5] - yo;
00051     A = 0.5*fabs(ax*by-ay*bx);
00052 }
00053 
00054 EGS_TriangleShape::EGS_TriangleShape(const EGS_Float *points,
00055                                      const string &Name, EGS_ObjectFactory *f) : EGS_SurfaceShape(Name,f) {
00056     xo = points[0];
00057     yo = points[1];
00058     ax = points[2] - xo;
00059     ay = points[3] - yo;
00060     bx = points[4] - xo;
00061     by = points[5] - yo;
00062     A = 0.5*fabs(ax*by-ay*bx);
00063 }
00064 
00065 EGS_PolygonShape::EGS_PolygonShape(const vector<EGS_Float> &points,
00066                                    const string &Name, EGS_ObjectFactory *f) : EGS_SurfaceShape(Name,f) {
00067     int np = points.size();
00068     n = np/2;
00069     EGS_Float auxx = points[np-2] - points[0];
00070     EGS_Float auxy = points[np-1] - points[1];
00071     EGS_Float *xc, *yc;
00072     if (auxx*auxx + auxy*auxy > 1e-8) {
00073         n++;
00074     }
00075     xc = new EGS_Float [n];
00076     yc = new EGS_Float [n];
00077     vector<EGS_2DVector> p1;
00078     for (int j=0; j<np/2; j++) {
00079         xc[j] = points[2*j];
00080         yc[j] = points[2*j+1];
00081         p1.push_back(EGS_2DVector(xc[j],yc[j]));
00082     }
00083     if (n > np/2) {
00084         xc[n-1] = points[0];
00085         yc[n-1] = points[1];
00086         p1.push_back(EGS_2DVector(xc[n-1],yc[n-1]));
00087     }
00088     EGS_2DPolygon pol(p1);
00089     int ntr = 0;
00090     triangle = new EGS_TriangleShape* [n-3];
00091     np = n;
00092     EGS_Float p_tmp[6];
00093     while (np > 3) {
00094         for (int i=0; i<np-2; i++) {
00095             EGS_2DVector aux(0.5*(xc[i+2]+xc[i]),0.5*(yc[i+2]+yc[i]));
00096             if (pol.isInside(aux)) {
00097                 bool is_ok = true;
00098                 vector<EGS_2DVector> p2;
00099                 for (int k=0; k<3; k++) {
00100                     p_tmp[2*k] = xc[i+k];
00101                     p_tmp[2*k+1] = yc[i+k];
00102                     p2.push_back(EGS_2DVector(xc[i+k],yc[i+k]));
00103                 }
00104                 EGS_2DPolygon tri(p2);
00105                 for (int j=0; j<np-1; j++) {
00106                     if (j < i || j > i+2) {
00107                         EGS_2DVector tmp(xc[j],yc[j]);
00108                         if (tri.isInside(tmp)) {
00109                             is_ok = false;
00110                             break;
00111                         }
00112                     }
00113                 }
00114                 if (is_ok) {
00115                     EGS_TriangleShape *t = new EGS_TriangleShape(p_tmp);
00116                     triangle[ntr++] = t;
00117                     for (int j=i+1; j<np-1; j++) {
00118                         xc[j] = xc[j+1];
00119                         yc[j] = yc[j+1];
00120                     }
00121                 }
00122                 np--;
00123             }
00124         }
00125     }
00126     for (int k=0; k<3; k++) {
00127         p_tmp[2*k] = xc[k];
00128         p_tmp[2*k+1] = yc[k];
00129     }
00130     triangle[ntr++] = new EGS_TriangleShape(p_tmp);
00131     A = 0;
00132     for (int i=0; i<ntr; i++) {
00133         yc[i] = triangle[i]->area();
00134         A += yc[i];
00135     }
00136     table = new EGS_AliasTable(ntr,xc,yc,0);
00137     delete [] xc;
00138     delete [] yc;
00139 }
00140 
00141 extern "C" {
00142 
00143     EGS_POLYGON_SHAPE_EXPORT EGS_BaseShape *createShape(EGS_Input *input,
00144             EGS_ObjectFactory *f) {
00145         if (!input) {
00146             egsWarning("createShape(polygon): null input?\n");
00147             return 0;
00148         }
00149         vector<EGS_Float> points;
00150         int err = input->getInput("points",points);
00151         if (err) {
00152             egsWarning("createShape(polygon): no 'points' input\n");
00153             return 0;
00154         }
00155         int np = points.size();
00156         if ((np%2) != 0) {
00157             egsWarning("createShape(polygon): you must input an even number of"
00158                        " floating numbers\n");
00159             return 0;
00160         }
00161         if (np < 6) {
00162             egsWarning("createShape(polygon): you must input at least 3 2D points"
00163                        " to form a polygon\n");
00164             return 0;
00165         }
00166         EGS_BaseShape *shape;
00167         if (np == 6) {
00168             shape = new EGS_TriangleShape(points,"",f);
00169         }
00170         else {
00171             shape = new EGS_PolygonShape(points,"",f);
00172         }
00173         shape->setName(input);
00174         shape->setTransformation(input);
00175         return shape;
00176     }
00177 
00178 }
